title: Beetlejuice
producer: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
opening_crawl: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

title: The Cotton Club
producer: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee
opening_crawl: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
producer: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
opening_crawl: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Crocodile Dundee
producer: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
opening_crawl: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

title: Valkyrie
producer: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson
opening_crawl: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

title: Ratatouille
producer: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
opening_crawl: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

title: City of God
producer: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
opening_crawl: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

title: Memento
producer: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
opening_crawl: A man juggles searching for his wife's murderer and keeping his short-term memory loss from being an obstacle.

title: The Intouchables
producer: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
opening_crawl: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Stardust
producer: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly
opening_crawl: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.
